long_description: The boys' REI water shoes are ready for romps in wet conditions, thanks to quick-drying materials and grippy soles. Soft and comfortable polyester jersey and stretch nylon mesh uppers dry quickly and wrap feet for a secure fit; heel loops aid entry and exit. A secure, comfortable fit is as easy as a simple pull thanks to the quick-pull laces that secure with cordlocks. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort. Durable thermoplastic rubber outsoles on our REI boys' water shoes supply ample traction and guard against rough or sharp surfaces underfoot.
short_description: The boys' REI water shoes are ready for romps in wet conditions, thanks to quick-drying materials and grippy soles.
